import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update ticket custom fields"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/custom-fields"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates one or more custom field values on an existing ticket.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) or your webhook payload to capture the target ticket's `TicketId`.
2. **CustomFieldTypeId** – Call [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) or [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types](/docs/api/custom-fields/list-custom-field-types) to map the custom field you intend to update and extract `CustomFieldValues[].CustomFieldTypeId`.
3. **Value format** – Match the `EditorTypeId` for the target field (text, numeric, dropdown, multi-select) to ensure the `Value` payload uses the correct casing or serialized array format.

**Workflow Example (WAG Osceola claim integration)**
1. Locate the insurance claim ticket via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) (filter by Issue or Workflow step) and capture `Items[0].TicketId`.
2. Inspect current custom fields with [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm the `CustomFieldTypeId` that stores the WAG Claim Number.
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/custom-fields](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-custom-fields) with an array of `TicketCustomFieldUpdateItem` objects (each containing `TicketId`, `CustomFieldTypeId`, and the new `Value`).
4. (Optional) Follow up with [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/activities/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-activity) to log the claim approval/denial and include the same claim number in an activity comment.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ticketId, each request item requires `TicketId`, `CustomFieldTypeId`, and either `Value` or `ComplexValue` data, depending on the field editor type.

This endpoint is currently used by the WAG Osceola insurance claim workflow to synchronize claim numbers before submitting workflow actions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket receiving the custom field update.","example":"3a66c3fc-9fbf-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of ticket custom field updates. Most integrations only need to provide `TicketId`, `CustomFieldTypeId`, `Value`, and (optionally) `EditorTypeId`, but the service accepts the richer metadata seen in HAR captures for parity with the agent portal.","properties":{"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the ticket whose custom field should be updated. /api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket).","example":"abefec53-0823-4909-9d69-fdedebc46035","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"listCustomFieldTypes","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/types","responseField":"Items[].CustomFieldTypeId"}},"CustomFieldId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the specific custom field instance, when available (e.g., `CustomFieldValues[].CustomFieldId`).","nullable":true},"EditorTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Editor type identifier that informs the service how to parse `Value` (Text=1, Number=4, Dropdown=8, Multi-select=10, etc.).","example":1},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Scope for the custom field (Site, Product, or Global).","example":"Site"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier that owns the custom field definition.","nullable":true},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product/module associated with the custom field.","nullable":true},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type identifier corresponding to the ticket custom field scope.","nullable":true},"IsRequired":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the custom field must contain a value."},"IsReadOnly":{"type":"boolean","description":"Flag used by the UI to prevent edits to system-managed fields."},"IsHidden":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the field is hidden from most users."},"IsSystemField":{"type":"boolean","description":"True when the field ships with Incident IQ and may have additional validation rules."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Soft delete flag for the field metadata."},"DisplayOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Display order in the ticket form."},"TypeDisplayOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Display order relative to other fields of the same type."},"SetDisplayOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Display order relative to other fields in the same set."},"Value":{"description":"Value assigned to the custom field. Text and dropdown editors accept strings, numeric editors accept numbers, and multi-select editors accept an array of option identifiers or a JSON string representation depending on tenant configuration. May be null when the field value has not been set.","oneOf":[{"type":"string","nullable":true,"example":"WAG-CLM-004218"},{"type":"number"},{"type":"boolean"},{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["OptionA","OptionB"]},{"type":"object","description":"Complex custom field values serialized as structured JSON.","additionalProperties":true}]},"ComplexValue":{"type":"object","description":"Optional complex value payload for editor types that require structured data (e.g., cascading dropdowns).","additionalProperties":true,"nullable":true},"IsValid":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the value passed validation."},"FilterSetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Filter set identifier used by conditional dropdowns.","nullable":true},"OriginSourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Source identifier recorded when the field originated from another system.","nullable":true},"OriginId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Original identifier from the source system (if applicable).","nullable":true}},"required":["TicketId","CustomFieldTypeId"],"example":{"TicketId":"3a66c3fc-9fbf-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","CustomFieldTypeId":"abefec53-0823-4909-9d69-fdedebc46035","EditorTypeId":1,"Value":"WAG-CLM-004218","IsHidden":false},"title":"TicketCustomFieldUpdateItem"},"minItems":1,"example":[{"TicketId":"3a66c3fc-9fbf-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","CustomFieldTypeId":"abefec53-0823-4909-9d69-fdedebc46035","EditorTypeId":1,"Value":"WAG-CLM-004218"},{"TicketId":"3a66c3fc-9fbf-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","CustomFieldTypeId":"b7b2c399-9e97-4ed5-bdc0-31a3338d07e7","EditorTypeId":10,"Value":["Expedite shipping","Loaner needed"]}],"title":"TicketCustomFieldUpdateRequest"},"example":[{"TicketId":"3a66c3fc-9fbf-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","CustomFieldTypeId":"abefec53-0823-4909-9d69-fdedebc46035","EditorTypeId":1,"Value":"WAG-CLM-004218","TagTypeId":1,"Scope":"Site"}]}}}}

</RequestSchema>
